snippet: The maestro Riccardo Muti brought the Chicago Symphony Orchestra to Carnegie Hall for three concerts, a master class and a side trip to Bellevue Hospital.
abstract: James R Oestreich Critic's Notebook observes three concerts played by Chicago Symphony Orchestra at Carnegie Hall bear imprint of music director Riccardo Muti; notes Carnegie residency, in keeping with orchestra's expansive efforts, also includes master classes and visit to Bellevue Hospital Center.
lead_paragraph: The maestro Riccardo Muti brought the Chicago Symphony Orchestra to Carnegie Hall for three concerts, a master class and a side trip to Bellevue Hospital.

headline.seo: Chicago Orchestra at Carnegie Hall and Beyond
headline.main: Symphonies and Solace in an Orchestra’s Three-Night Stand
headline.print_headline: Symphony and Solace in a Three-Night Stand
